mapper.update:
update drug
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
format = #{format,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT},
where drug_id = #{drugId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update drug set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, format = #{format,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manufacturer = #{manufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dosage_id = #{dosageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, mnemonic_code = #{mnemonicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT} where drug_id = #{drugId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
